reviews.text: We only stayed here one evening, but simply wanted to note that in our brief experience the staff at Sunny Beach were helpful and engaged in their work... customer relations were not a problem for us. The hotel itself was neat, clean and tidy. Breakfast was OK, nothing special. I guess given the competition along Nguyen Dinh Chieu, there is nothing to make Sunny Beach a stand-out, but i would happily return.
reviews.title: Very Good, but not Outstanding in a beach-strip with many choices

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were very lucky to get upgraded to a splendid beach-front villa, which made our stay very comfortable in the end. But there are a few downsides on this place that are quite annoying.
reviews.title: They could make so much more of this place

reviews.text: For example: the area around the bar has to experience hours on end of the same fake balearic rumba music blasting through the speakers. Maybe appealing to the herds of Russian and Chinese visitors, but certainly not to me.
reviews.title: Best 4 star quality to be had in Mui Ne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hubby & I stayed in this lovely resort in April for 4 nights. We had a seaview bungalow which was just steps from the beach - lovely room with the most comfortable king-size bed we slept in, during our 3 week trip around Vietnam.
reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful - But no pool service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed over new year for 5 nights at sunny beach resort and were lucky to get a room at the last minute as the resort was fully booked and so was Mui Ne in general. The resort grounds and two pools and beach area are all well looked after - in fact the gardens are really beautiful. The fact that there are two pools works well also. Breakfast was quite good and there were attentive staff on hand. We stayed in one Villa which had an amazingly comfy bed (soft in comparison to most asian beds!) but the bathroom had a suspicious smell coming from the shower recess. The second villa we stayed in was bigger, with a massive bathroom and outdoor shower however a few mozzies were hovering. There are lots of bars & restaurants in the locality. Oh, New Year Gala Dinner was compuslory (expensive at $58 per person). Good resort overall but not luxury.
reviews.title: A good resort in Mui Ne right on the beach
Nice but a bit expensive for standard room...
